mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO recipes (title, making_time, serves, ingredients, cost, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{makingTime}, #{serves}, #{ingredients}, #{cost}, NOW(), NOW())
SELECT currval('recipes_id_seq')
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, making_time AS makingTime, serves, ingredients, cost FROM recipes
mapper.update: UPDATE recipes SET title = #{recipe.title}, making_time = #{recipe.makingTime}, serves = #{recipe.serves}, ingredients = #{recipe.ingredients}, cost = #{recipe.cost}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
